content.rendered:
[vc_row full_width=”true” type=”ww-custom” background_image=”8168″ bg_position=”top” bg_repeat=”repeat” same_height=”” padding_top=”30″ padding_bottom=”30″ margin_top=”0″ margin_bottom_row=”0″ enable_parallax=”” parallax_speed=”0.1″][vc_column width=”1/1″][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/1″][vc_column_text]

Watermain break repair. In on Monday morning to evaluate, expose, gather parts, repair and flush line for operation on Tuesday morning. Asphalt patching took place a week later after ground settlement was complete.

Parkade roof membrane replacement on a condo site to stop structural concrete roof slab problems forthcoming.

Vancouver Convention Centre Vault Repairs from roaron

Post tensioned vault failure and repair at Vancouver Convention Centre, electrical room construction below sea level.

Parkade roof membrane replacement, parking lot paving on top of membrane, concrete delamination and structural repairs of the parkade using Mapei products. Reinforcing bar addressed and structural capacity of the deck increased to support the designated load.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]
